predicate.note: Frames file for 'modulate' based on sentences in wsj. No verbnet entry.

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: The chords modulate, but there is little filigree even though his fingers begin to wander over more of the keys.

example.name: all args
example.text: John modulated the chord progression from C major to C-sharp major, the long way around.
